word:
Children are allowed to eat flesh meats, spices, butter, cheese, pork, rich pastry, and condiments generally. They 
                                                                           79
are also allowed to eat of unhealthful food at irregular hours and between meals. These things do their work of deranging the stomach, exciting the nerves to unnatural action, and enfeebling the intellect. Parents do not realize that they are sowing the seed that will bring forth disease and death.
